# repo Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    nomad = {
      source  = "hashicorp/nomad"
      version = "2.4.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "nomad" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to {scheme}://{address}:{port}/v1)
- `x_nomad_token` (String, Sensitive)
